channel.title: Small item error
channel.description:
my bloods turn into ecto-tokens when i log out then back in with them....
any ideas?

Learn to code java.

item.title: Small item error
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

[quote=“wooker, post:7, topic:82289”][quote author=God Tricky link=topic=120939.msg1185547#msg1185547 date=1177075786]
ummm, guys…I DONT CARE ABOUT ECTO - TOKENS I WANT BLOODS

THE ONLY PROBLEM I GOT WITH THEM IS THEY TURN INTO ECTOS!!!

MY QUESTIONS WAS SIMPLY HOW DO U STOP THEM FROM CHANGING?
[/quote]Search and delete this in your client.java ReplaceItems(565, 4278); // Xerozcheez: Replaces blood runes with ectos[/quote]

THANK YOU!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Small item error
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:2, topic:82289”]its normal, bloods are said to cause server crashes so ectoes work like lboods on most servers even though the spells may be dark like u cant use em, u still can. i removed the change on mine, so on mine you use bloodz and i havent noticed any more crashes yet so idk if they realy do crash…[/quote]Try spawning 500k bloods, then bank and withdraw them Lol

item.title: Small item error
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Look, just don’t use bloods is what he’s saying Okay?

Go to folder ‘characters’

Go to your character profile, search the Item ID of bloods and remove it from the invertory.

Read full topic
